DocAttribute.Name: SlippageX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage of that connection. Defines the maximum displacement in x-direction without any loading applied.

DocAttribute.Name: SlippageY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage of that connection. Defines the maximum displacement in y-direction without any loading applied.

DocAttribute.Name: SlippageZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage of that connection. Defines the maximum displacement in z-direction without any loading applied.
